pullrequest.title: Add a 'run repeat' attribute to shot files.

content.raw:
Looking good.

Could you replace lines 755 and 853 with a readonly File object?

I think it would also make sense to wrap those two file accesses in a try except clause just in case something went terribly wrong.

Looking good.

I think it would also make sense to wrap those two file accesses in a try except clause just in case something went terribly wrong.
